text: The flag of Formentera () It is colored white flag with a red canton on the left. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the with of the center. The flag of Formentera has been official of this Spanish island since 2010 along with its coat of arms, the ratio of the flag is 2:4. The flag consists of the flag of the Crown of Aragon, with the island shield superimposed and occupying a central position. This shield has a rhomboid shape with a blue background and above it a gold tower supported by a wavy silver foot and flanked by two ears of wheat in gold color and, in its upper part, a small four-bar shield. ==References== Formentera
title: Flag of Formentera
